scripts.check: bun develop/scripts/unicode_safety_check.ts --all && bun develop/tools/skill/validate.ts --all && bun develop/tools/skill/inventory.ts && git diff --exit-code -- design/skills/SKILL_INVENTORY.md && bun develop/scripts/skill_inventory_checks.ts && bun develop/tools/compile/verify.ts --model-cmd "bun develop/tools/compile/mock-model.ts"
